titleStmt.title: By the Quene the Quene our soueraine ladye, understandynge that a multitude of euyl disposed persones, beying borne out of her highnes dominions in other sundrie nations, fleinge from the obeysaunce of the princes and rulers under whome they be borne ... be resorted and come into Her Maiesties realme ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

titleStmt.title: By the Quene the Quene our soueraine ladye, understandynge that a multitude of euyl disposed persones, beying borne out of her highnes dominions in other sundrie nations, fleinge from the obeysaunce of the princes and rulers under whome they be borne ... be resorted and come into Her Maiesties realme ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Reginæ excusum,

notesStmt.note: For causing foreigners to leave England.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
